content.description: Once in the saddle between Morning Glory and Cibola Mitten boulder up the short headwall then turn left and scramble up. There are a few short borderline 5th class spots where some climbers may want a belay. Top out and enjoy one of the best summits in all of Sedona.(Three stars for the summit views. One star for the climbing.)
content.protection: A rope and one or two draws for some fixed gear on this route.  This is a great route to take a hiker or beginning climber up.  There is a fixed baby angle on the spire's summit to clip nervous partners into, but there is not rap anchor.  Descent is by downclimbing the route.  (This is where the rope may really come in handy...)
content.location: The route starts on the East face of the spire in the Saddle between Morning Glory and Cibola Mitten. Look for the path of least resistance.

content.description: Morning Glory Spire is located between Coffee Pot Rock and Cibola Mitten. There is a seldom climbed Trad route on it's Southwestern face, and the 4th class route described here on it's Southeast face.
